Actions.Name: Greenwrath
Actions.Effects: Deals bonus damage and inflicts sealed if a character is inside dangerous or difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Sow
Actions.Description: The [name] marks a foe in range. That foe takes 1 piercing damage when marked.

Combo.Name: Reap
Combo.Description: All foes marked by Sow take 3 piercing damage once for every foe marked by Sow.

Actions.Name: Sanctify
Actions.TerrainEffect: The [name] scatters salt in a medium blast area in range. Foes that end their turn in the area become pacified. Allies that end their turn in the area gain 2 vigor. This area ends if this ability is used again.
